Retrieved 2015-05-30.(originally titled The Bet) is a 2015 Filipino teen romantic comedy-drama film directed by Theodore Boborol, and written by Maan Dimaculangan-Fampulme and Ceres Helga Barrios, starring the hit ‘Forevermore’ tandem of Enrique Gil and Liza Soberano.PHOTOS: JUST THE WAY YOU ARE Grand Presscon!. Myx Philippines. Retrieved 2015-06-01.Video: Just The Way You Are Grand Presscon Part 2. Wazzup. Retrieved 2015-06-01. The film is based on the best-selling Pop Fiction book ‘‘The Bet’’ which was originally published on Wattpad by Kimberly Joy Villanueva (ilurvbooks).Enrique Gil, Liza Soberano star in ‘The Bet’. Star Cinema. Retrieved 2014-07-10.After #Forevermore, abangan naman sina Enrique Gil at Liza Soberano on the big screen! #JustTheWayYouAre. '. Retrieved 2015-05-31. ==Synopsis== In love, the stakes are high. When you live for no one... or when you have almost no one... will you still bet your all? The story follows a popular guy named Drake Sison (Enrique Gil), who makes a bet with his best friend Andrei (Yves Flores), to make the nerdy transfer student, Sophia Taylor (Liza Soberano), fall in love with him in 30 days. Once she falls for him, he must confess that it was all a bet. ==Cast== ===Main cast=== *Enrique Gil as Drake "Draky" Sison *Liza Soberano as Sophia "Pie" Taylor ===Supporting cast=== *Yayo Aguila as Tita Veronica / Tita V *Sue Ramirez as Driana Sison *Alex Diaz as Marcus *Myrtle Sarrosa as Bea *Miguel Vergara as Matt *Yves Flores as Andrei *Anjo Damiles as Ricky *Jon Lucas as Ivan *Chienna Filomeno as Cassidy *Marco Gumabao as Skye *Erin Ocampo as Chloe *Kyra Custodio as Jamie ===Special participation=== *Tonton Gutierrez as Theodore Sison *Sunshine Cruz as Cecilia Sison *Ricky Davao as Arthur Taylor *Maris Racal as Amy (cameo) ==Soundtracks== The theme song of the movie is called "Smile In Your Heart", an OPM classic given a fresh take by Filipino all-male group, Harana.The theme song of "Just The Way You Are" is an OPM classic given a fresh take by male singer Ariel Rivera. .
